attributes.action: No more new buildings for any religious persuasion should be erected in this country
attributes.additional_details: All land available for building should be used for housing and businesses,  Religious meetings can be held in any building i.e village hall, community hall, school hall etc., and a designated one is not necessary.   The government should introduce legislation for planning authorites to refuse applications for Cathedrals, Temples, Synagogues, Mosques, Churches etc., as these buildings are not necessary.
